rathmalana - karamandiya polwaththa asaladi kerala ganja kilogram 2 yi gram 250 k samaga kanthawak galkissa polisiya wisin eeye athadanguwata gena thibenawa. 32 hawiridi aya rathmalana pradeshaye padinchikariyak bawayi polis madhya kottashaya sadahan kale.sakakariya ada galkissa mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kirimata niyamithayi.
